Summary: Orange Ball looking NW, it was moving SE slowly then STOPPED then hoverd then a cloud bank coverd it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in macomb twp.
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details Looking NE Orange ball shaped bright thought at 1st was a meteor skipping on atmosphere then realized quickly it was moving SE for about 3 minutes was bright then it was sitting in a stationary position til a cloud bank took it out of sight. Just like to add today was a air show at local base but , this was odd or i would not be here writing it at this moment , went back outside 3 minutes later was gone so was clouds,... strange. then came in and thought i would make a report this is my 1st time on this web site.
